++ Intro Dutch Golden Age
[:rel:back]
----

The Golden Age was a period in Dutch history, roughly spanning the 17th century, in which Dutch trade, science, and art were among the most acclaimed in the world. For more detailed information see Wikipedia:  [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutch_Golden_Age |Dutch Golden Age]
